metadata.title: CVE-2020-15365 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: LibRaw before 0.20-Beta3 has an out-of-bounds write in parse_exif() inmetadata\exif_gps.cpp via an unrecognized AtomName and a zero value oftiff_nifds.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
